title: Leagues to Miles Converter – league to mile & kilometer

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: English land league: 1 league = 3 × 1609.344 m = 4828.032 m Nautical league: 1 league = 3 × 1852 m = 5556 m French league: 1 league = 4000 m Then: miles = meters / 1609.344; kilometers = meters / 1000
